original_text: She shouts her message to people as they pass along the road to do their work. She shouts her message to people as they pass along the road to do their work. She shouts her message to people as they pass along the road to do their work.
korean_text: 자기 길을 바로 가는 행인들을 불러 이르되

sentences.original_text: to people as they pass along the road
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 길을 따라 지나갈 때 그들에게
